name: Vigor Mortis
description:
To get the full intended experience we recommend downloading the game. 
If you’re playing in-browser and experiencing performance issues, trying a different browser might help.

You are a regular kid on your way to gather some mushrooms for your dear granny when you realize you got lost in thought and wandered right into a graveyard - which is filled to the brim with REANIMATED DEAD!!!

But with the help of a LONG LOST MAGICAL ARTIFACT you too can reincarnate these departed souls and use their posthumous strength to propel yourself upwards, and in other directions too.

This game puts your HIGH VELOCITY PLATFORMING skills to the test in many levels, featuring optional collectibles and not-so-optional challenges along the way.

The game also keeps track of your best completion time and lowest death count.  Learn from your past selves’ mistakes and rise from their failures like a phoenix from the ashes!

Utilize reinvigorated skeletons of those who came before you to compensate for your own meek physique! Who doesn’t like a power fantasy?!

Get ready for a real "graveyard shift" in VIGOR MORTIS!

HappyHead – Art

Sisi – Cover Art

jm2k – Coding, Music

Special Thanks: Team Folio
